reviewText: Dora the Explorer - Shy RainbowGreat DVD, Whom ever has a little child that loves Dora, will love this. Like all of them they have Great music and sing a long. Great color for the little ones even. Great DVD
Title: Dora the Explorer - Shy Rainbow

reviewText: My three year old grandaughter has gotten a lot ofenjoyment from the DVD. Her Mom likes it too. The colors are bright, the lyrics and dialogue are OK for a three year old and the story is entertaining.  Well worth the price. I would buy it again, in fact I have purchased two more of this series.
Title: Dora the Explorer - Shy Rainbow

reviewText: Very good Movie. My Granddaughter nloves watching this movie over and over.Thanks Lesley Kaiser Australia
Title: Dora the Explorer - Shy Rainbow

reviewText: I bought this for my daughter she also loves dora and watches this off and on all day too.  She has started talking more from watching Dora and Diego also before she would not talk.
Title: Dora the Explorer - Shy Rainbow

reviewText: Dora is always fun and educational.  My kids have all of the Dora's, and this one is no exception.  I believe the early introduction of Spanish has given them a good start, my 2 1/2 year old son blurts our Spanish phrases or verbs on a regular basis.
Title: Dora the Explorer - Shy Rainbow
